tier.item: (199) Mari gyereket v´ ar. proi Azt rem´ hogy pro j fiu lesz,
Mari child.Acc expect. proi that hopes that proj boy be
´ hogy ma jd j fogja ´ enni az uzletet.
and that Future hej will take over the business
`Mari is expecting a child. She hopes that it will be a boy and
that he will take over the business in the future.'
